Quality Education.reason: The course aims to build understanding of regional societies and "cultivate a multicultural perspective," which are key components of a quality education for global citizenship.

建立對該區域社會、人文、宗教的認識 (build understanding of the region's society, humanities, and religion)
作為現代公民，相信培養多元文化視野以及對世界宗教的認識將是不可或缺的一環 (As modern citizens, cultivating a multicultural perspective and understanding world religions is an indispensable part)
